#	LCM_POLARITY_FALLING = 1

#	SYNC_PULSE_VDO_MODE = 1,
#	SYNC_EVENT_VDO_MODE = 2,
#	BURST_VDO_MODE = 3

#	LCM_FOUR_LANE = 4,

#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_BGR = 1

#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_LSB = 0,

#read_id_mask =1, means id=(buff[2]<<8)|buff[3]
#read_id_mask =2, means id=(buff[0]<<8)|buff2[0] (buff[0]  read from a registor like 0x04,0xc4...,buff2[0] read from  the other registor  like 0x05,0xc5...  according to the  IC)

#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_ONLY = 1,
#	LCM_DBI_TE_MODE_VSYNC_OR_HSYNC = 2,
te_mode = 0;

#	LCM_POLARITY_RISING = 0,
#	LCM_POLARITY_FALLING = 1
te_edge_polarity= 0;

#	CMD_MODE = 0,
#	SYNC_PULSE_VDO_MODE = 1,
#	SYNC_EVENT_VDO_MODE = 2,
#	BURST_VDO_MODE = 3
mode = 3;

#	LCM_ONE_LANE = 1,
#	LCM_TWO_LANE = 2,
#	LCM_THREE_LANE = 3,
#	LCM_FOUR_LANE = 4,
lane_num= 2;

#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_RGB = 0,
#	LCM_COLOR_ORDER_BGR = 1
color_order = 0;

#	LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_MSB_FIRST = 0,
#   LCM_DSI_TRANS_SEQ_LSB_FIRST = 1

#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_LSB = 0,
#	LCM_DSI_PADDING_ON_MSB = 1

#	LCM_DSI_FORMAT_RGB888 = 2

direction=0;

[mir3da]
name="mir3da";
i2c_num=2;
direction=1;

[MC3XXX]
name="MC3XXX";
i2c_num=2;
direction=1;
[sc7a20]
name="sc7a20";
i2c_num=2;
direction=0;

[alsps]
section_name="stk3x1x_auto","epl259x_auto","em3071x_auto","ap3426";

[stk3x1x_auto]
name="stk3x1x";
i2c_num=2;
als_level=5,9,36,59,82,132,205,273,500,845,1136,1545,2364,4655,6982;
als_value=10,10,40,65,90,145,225,300,550,930,1250,1700,2600,5120,7680,10240;
ps_threshold_high=150;
ps_threshold_low=100;
state_val=0;
psctrl_val=0x31;
alsctrl_val=0x39;
ledctrl_val=0xff;
wait_val=0x7;
alsps_eint=6,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
stk_max_min_diff=170;
stk_lt_n_ct=150;
stk_ht_n_ct=170;

[epl259x_auto]
name="epl_sensor";
i2c_num=2;
als_level=5,9,36,59,82,132,205,273,500,845,1136,1545,2364,4655,6982;
als_value=10,10,40,65,90,145,225,300,550,930,1250,1700,2600,5120,7680,10240;
ps_threshold_high=150;
ps_threshold_low=100;
state_val=0;
psctrl_val=0x31;
alsctrl_val=0x39;
ledctrl_val=0xff;
wait_val=0x7;
alsps_eint=6,6,1,0,1,0,9,9;
stk_max_min_diff=40;
stk_lt_n_ct=30;
stk_ht_n_ct=40;

[em3071x_auto]

[ap3426]
name="ap3426";
i2c_num=2;
als_level=5,9,36,59,82,132,205,273,500,845,1136,1545,2364,4655,6982;
als_value=10,10,40,65,90,145,225,300,550,930,1250,1700,2600,5120,7680,10240;
ps_threshold_high=8;
ps_threshold_low=5;
state_val=0;
psctrl_val=0x31;
alsctrl_val=0x39;
ledctrl_val=0xff;
wait_val=0x7;
alsps_eint=3,0,1,9,1,0,1,0;
stk_max_min_diff=40;
stk_lt_n_ct=30;
stk_ht_n_ct=40;

[misc]
section_name="misc_setting";

[misc_setting]
#main flash settings two ways:1.ISINK   A + B a,b ;C a,b;D a,b....+9            2.GPIO    A+B a;C b +9
#if  A=0  means main flash is isinks(way  1) , B and C is isink number,  'a' means output current(it can be 0,1,2,3,4 means output 0ma,4ma,8ma,16ma,24ma)
#'b' means whether need double if 'b'=1  'a' output current is 0ma,8ma,16ma,32ma,48ma ,'...' means more isinks can be set,'9' means settings end
#if  A=1 means main flash is GPIO (way 2),
#B means gpio number  ,'a' means gpio level ;C also is gpio number ,'b' is gpio number; '9' means settings end(ordinaryly   B and C used for torch and flash)
main_flash=1,17,1,1,21,1,1,9;
sub_flash=1,18,1,1,9;
gps_lna=65,9,9,9,9,9,9,9;
